overview: When the Davis and Stone family get together the sexual sparks fly! Watch as Evan Stone pound's his friend's daughter. Mom, Lisa Ann, and her daughter's best girlfriend Georgia make creamy lesbian love. Mark Davis and his wife have a threeway with the neighbor's daughter. Even the chronic masturbating son James gets it on with his adopted Asian sister Miko. Walking the fine line between deviance and fantasy, Friends And Family is where sex, love, greed, and lust collide in a cum-filled utopia.
title: Friends and Family
